entry.title: These lights in Portal 2 have a secret - Quick Answer #shorts

media:group.media:title: These lights in Portal 2 have a secret - Quick Answer #shorts
media:group.media:description:
These small lights hold a little secret; they don't contain anything at all! Another quick answer, a series on quick techniques too simple for a longer video.
Don't worry, longer videos are still coming.
🐦 https://twitter.com/JasperRLZ 💰 https://patreon.com/JasperRLZ 🤼 https://discord.gg/bkJmKKv 🌎 https://noclip.website
🎵 Mike Morasky - Portal 2 - Robot Waiting Room #4 ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lCrok_f3AP4 )
💜 Jacob, Jasmine 🖥️ Some visuals were made with a modified version of noclip.website

entry.title: The small detail behind Breath of the Wild's Thousands of Trees - Quick Answer #shorts

media:group.media:title: The small detail behind Breath of the Wild's Thousands of Trees - Quick Answer #shorts
media:group.media:description:
How can Breath of the Wild render thousands of different trees in the world at once? Here's a quick answer, a series on quick techniques too simple for a longer video.
Don't worry, longer videos are still coming.
🐦 https://twitter.com/JasperRLZ 💰 https://patreon.com/JasperRLZ 🤼 https://discord.gg/bkJmKKv 🌎 https://noclip.website
🎵 Yasuaki Iwata - Hateno Village (Day) ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ngXHSqzhRXc )
💜 Jewel, Jasmine, Jacob, 3moon, Argle Bargle
Also, everyone who posts "sus" in the comments owes me $1,000,000,000 (1 billion) US dollars. This is a legally binding contract.

entry.title: How Link's eyebrows go over his hair - Quick Answer #shorts

media:group.media:title: How Link's eyebrows go over his hair - Quick Answer #shorts
media:group.media:description:
How do Link's eyes and eyebrows render on top of his face in The Wind Waker? Here's a quick answer, the first video in a series on quick techniques too simple for a longer video.
Don't worry, longer videos are still coming.
🐦 https://twitter.com/JasperRLZ 💰 https://patreon.com/JasperRLZ 🤼 https://discord.gg/bkJmKKv 🌎 https://noclip.website
🎵 Kenta Nagata - Outset Island ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hUiAmrtxits )
🎥 Footage from The Wind Waker, Kill la Kill, Sailor Moon 🎥 Link concept art from Hyrule Historia
💜 Jewel, Jasmine, Argle Bargle

entry.title: The Charm Behind Super Mario Galaxy 2 - a Conversation with @Scruffy, part 2

media:group.media:title: The Charm Behind Super Mario Galaxy 2 - a Conversation with @Scruffy, part 2
media:group.media:description:
Part 2 of a conversation I had with @Scruffy, answering some of your questions about Super Mario Galaxy's visuals, art style, graphics technology, and music.
Part 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f1sUPUGu9iw
🐦 https://twitter.com/JasperRLZ 🐦 https://twitter.com/Scruffy_Tweets 💰 https://patreon.com/JasperRLZ 🤼 https://discord.gg/bkJmKKv 🌎 https://noclip.website
🕹️ https://noclip.website/#InteractiveExamples/SlimySpringWater 🕹️ https://noclip.website/#InteractiveExamples/FoxFur
🎨 Buy de Blob 1 https://store.steampowered.com/app/532320/de_Blob/ ( also on Switch! ) 🖌️ Buy de Blob 2 https://store.steampowered.com/app/563190/de_Blob_2/ ( also on Switch! )
📰 LearnOpenGL - Normal Mapping ( https://learnopengl.com/Advanced-Lighting/Normal-Mapping ) 📰 Illustrative Rendering in Team Fortress 2, Mitchell et. al ( https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/apps/valve/2007/NPAR07_IllustrativeRenderingInTeamFortress2_Slides.pdf ) 📰 Real-Time Fur over Arbitrary Surfaces, Lengyel et. al ( http://hhoppe.com/fur.pdf )
🎥 Sounds in Super Mario Odyssey Harmonize with the Background Music ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U5-YDxH6It8 ) 🎥 Sea of Thieves | PC Gameplay | 1080p HD | Max Settings ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O2Py_GoPknc ) 🎥 MindJack FULL Walkthrough Gameplay - No Commentary (PS3 Longplay) ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HDni45GzkmQ ) 🎥 Longplay of Yoshi's Story ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XulvqhPKhrM )
🎵 Mahito Yokota - Super Mario Galaxy - File Select ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HwWWW_kAeAc ) 🎵 Jasper - Epoch ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DDmzbYV0d9M ) 🎵 Arvi Teikari - Baba Is You - Fruit On Grass - Garden ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sc_QWB2zwi8 ) 🎵 猫叉Master - Elebits - Story Mode ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sAXS7FbC9Dk ) 🎵 猫叉Master - Elebits - Mission Results ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EY2Bs0Q6sds ) 🎵 Akitaka Tohyama - Kotoba no Puzzle Mojipittan Daijiten - Tick up ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UzpR0yTHGpw ) 🎵 Kazumi Totaka - Yoshi's Story - Ending Story ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PaSg-4nZTbk ) 🎵 Koji Kondo - Super Mario 64 - File Select ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q_FCUrxESJs ) 🎵 Kenichi Tokoi - Sonic Unleashed - Spagonia Night ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K8iL8vsKaB4 ) 🎵 John Guscott - de Blob - Blissful ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7fF7rwx9q5k )
00:00 Are you sure that's a displacement map? 07:08 What's the difference between a displacement map and a normal map? 14:25 How do Pikmin's water reflections work? 19:59 In Slimy Spring Galaxy, the water pool up against the edges of the water. How does that work? 26:50 What is a mipmap? What is "miptrick"? 31:15 How does the rim lighting work in Super Mario Galaxy 1 & 2? 40:35 Do you like the more "crafted" from games like Yoshi's Wooly World or Kirby's Epic Yarn? 45:10 The crystals seem to refract and reflect things. What's the trick? 48:30 Why does Super Mario Galaxy's Fur hold up so well? 54:28 Talking about music, and Nintendo's audio technology for a bit 1:00:36 What's your favorite example of adaptive audio in a video game?
💜 Special Thanks to Patch

entry.title: How Spherical Planets Bent the Rules in Super Mario Galaxy

media:group.media:title: How Spherical Planets Bent the Rules in Super Mario Galaxy
media:group.media:description:
Let's find out how Super Mario Galaxy's gravity and physics engine broke all the rules, and changed the Mario series forever.
🐦 https://twitter.com/JasperRLZ 💰 https://patreon.com/JasperRLZ 🤼 https://discord.gg/bkJmKKv 🌎 https://noclip.website
📰 Thomas Grip - Planning: The Core Reason why Gameplay Feels Good ( https://frictionalgames.com/2017-05-planning-the-core-reason-why-gameplay-feels-good/ )
🎵 Mahito Yokota - Super Mario Galaxy - File Select ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HwWWW_kAeAc ) 🎵 Koji Kondo - Super Mario 64 - File Select ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q_FCUrxESJs ) 🎵 Arvi Teikari - Baba Is You - Fruit On Grass - Garden ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sc_QWB2zwi8 ) 🎵 猫叉Master - Elebits - Story Mode ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sAXS7FbC9Dk ) 🎵 Mahito Yokota - Super Mario Galaxy - To The Gateway ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zcjtjGCWDGY ) 🎵 Jasper - Epoch ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DDmzbYV0d9M )
🎥 Super Mario 128 Tech Demo HD ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FkjEfKaoJXM ) 🎥 Super Mario Odyssey Dev. Talk - ft. Mr. Koizumi ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EVNYfoFcrZY ) 🎥 Yoshiaki Koizumi @ Montreal International Game Summit 2007 ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A25Ab7RyUPs ) 🎥 Longplay of Donkey Kong Jungle Beat [HD] ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LeM2y-AeTmg ) 🎥 Miyamoto on World 1-1: How Nintendo made Mario's most iconic level ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zRGRJRUWafY ) 🎥 [LONGPLAY] NES - Super Mario Bros 3 (HD, 60FPS) ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2LTcQwmOV4 ) 🎥 Super Mario Odyssey (1/42) - Opening, Cap and Cascade Kingdoms ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UGTJZd4Io08 ) 🎥 Lighting and Day Night Cycle In Catalyst ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mEhKnnil9w4 ) 🎥 Extra footage of Super Mario Odyssey provided by MML's Commentaries ( https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAX4ogRqB75_auq7CbiszKg )
📰 Iwata Asks : Super Mario Galaxy : Volume 1: The Producer and Director ( http://iwataasks.nintendo.com/interviews/#/wii/super_mario_galaxy/0/0 ) 📰 Iwata Asks : Super Mario Galaxy : Volume 2: The Developers ( http://iwataasks.nintendo.com/interviews/#/wii/super_mario_galaxy/1/0 )
💜 Jewel, Jacob, Veegie, Scruffy, Muz, SolidifiedGaming, Will, Really_Tall, Argle Bargle 🧡 riidefi helped me with the code to show Mario's hitboxes inside the game.
🖥️ noclip.website code branch https://github.com/magcius/noclip.website/commits/E6_LDGRV_b1 🕹️ Visualizer cheat code for Super Mario Galaxy https://gist.github.com/magcius/92864505c2bf734dbfb8a250af9555b7
00:00 Intro 03:37 The Physics behind Spherical Planets in Super Mario Galaxy 26:03 Channel Update

entry.title: A Deeper Dive into Wind Waker's Lighting - a Conversation with @Scruffy, part 1

media:group.media:title: A Deeper Dive into Wind Waker's Lighting - a Conversation with @Scruffy, part 1
media:group.media:description:
Part 1 of a conversation I had with @Scruffy, answering some of your questions about noclip.website and The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker.
Please go watch their stuff! ◆ https://www.youtube.com/c/ScruffyMusic/videos ◆ https://twitter.com/Scruffy_Tweets ◆ https://twitter.com/JasperRLZ
Extra Links: ◆ noclip.website ( https://noclip.website ) ◆ bmdview.js, my original "alpha" version of noclip.website! ( https://magcius.github.io/bmdview.js/bmdview.html ) ◆ zelview.js, another super old tool I made ( https://magcius.github.io/zelview.js/zelview.html ) ◆ Winditor, by SageOfMirrors and LordNed ( https://lordned.github.io/Winditor/ ) ◆ The official noclip.website Discord Server ( https://discord.gg/bkJmKKv )
Timestamps: 00:00 - Introduction 00:58 - How does noclip.website work? How does it render video game maps? 06:48 - What is noclip.website written in? 09:00 - Where did the idea come from? 12:50 - Scruffy shares an anecdote about Pikmin 2 and subsequent level design and storytelling chat 21:40 - In the video on Cel Shading in The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker, how were the visualizations on vertex normals produced? 25:25 - How can a light source exist? Is it an object or a texture, or something else? 33:41 - Why is calculating a vertex normal tricky? Why not use face normals? 38:16 - Is ZAtoon a texture, or is it a look-up table or something like smoothstep? 43:44 - Why not generate palettes via rules but then tweak them manually? 48:03 - How are the palettes combined with Link's tunic? 56:25 - Does the ocean in The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker go on forever? How is it rendered? 1:03:16 - You missed something! They do tone the lighting down in the shadows. 1:08:08 - Thoughts on the HD remaster of The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker?
Music used: ◆ Allister Brimble - Fluidity - Tutorial ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WsGVUgZ7AUg ) ◆ 猫叉Master - Elebits - Story Mode ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sAXS7FbC9Dk ) ◆ Koji Kondo - Super Mario 64 - File Select ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q_FCUrxESJs ) ◆ 猫叉Master - Elebits - Mission Results ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EY2Bs0Q6sds ) ◆ Akitaka Tohyama - Kotoba no Puzzle Mojipittan Daijiten - Tick up ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UzpR0yTHGpw ) ◆ Mahito Yokota - Super Mario Galaxy - File Select ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HwWWW_kAeAc ) ◆ Jasper - Epoch ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DDmzbYV0d9M ) ◆ Jasper - Riverbank Café ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SX6HbMdNFcM )
Extra Sources Used: ◆ Master of Play, Nick Paumgarten, The New Yorker ( https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2010/12/20/master-of-play ) ◆ Japanese Zen Garden, Wikipedia ( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_rock_garden ) ◆ Types of light, Unity Manual ( https://docs.unity3d.com/Manual/Lighting.html ) ◆ How to make a scale model of the Sun and the Earth, BBC Bitesize ( https://www.bbc.co.uk/bitesize/topics/z8c9q6f/articles/z6tkw6f ) ◆ Dot Product, Falstad ( https://www.falstad.com/dotproduct/ ) ◆ Wind Temple | Zelda: The Wind Waker 100% Walkthrough "36/45" (No Commentary) ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UowrSvbzybA ) ◆ SUPERHOT Gameplay Walkthrough Part 1 [HD] 1080p 60fps | PC Xbox One ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3nZrqlpTMvw ) ◆ GuiltyGearXrd's Art Style : The X Factor Between 2D and 3D ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yhGjCzxJV3E ) ◆ Super Mario Sunshine Scrubbing Sirena Beach (HD) ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rTtoQEqmkh8 ) ◆ Cartoon-Looking Rendering of 3D-Scenes, Philippe Decaudin ( http://phildec.users.sourceforge.net/Research/RR-2919.php ) ◆ Stylized Rendering Techniques For Scalable Real-Time 3D Animation, A Lake et. al ( https://static.aminer.org/pdf/PDF/000/519/756/stylized_rendering_techniques_for_scalable_real_time_d_animation.pdf ) ◆ The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild at CEDEC 2017: Part 3: Sound Design in a Massive, Breathing World ( http://www.thefamicast.com/2017/12/part-3-sound-design-in-massive.html ) ◆ Absorbtion of Light, Siyavula ( https://www.siyavula.com/read/science/grade-8/visible-light/12-visible-light?id=toc-id-5 ) ◆ The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD — Title Screen (1080p) ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c6l9r_QkNlA )
Background: ◆ Super Smash Bros. Melee
Special Thanks to Patch, Muz, and Really_Tall

entry.title: Freight Car Frenzy (A Hat in Time Remix)

media:group.media:title: Freight Car Frenzy (A Hat in Time Remix)
media:group.media:description:
This was a jazz arrangement I had made back in 2017 for the A Hat in Time B-Side Soundtrack, but had not uploaded to my YouTube channel until now.
Also on SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/play-a-mini-game/freight-car-frenzy-train-rush-remix-a-hat-in-time/
Original composition by Pascal Michael Stiefel Remix by Jasper Mixing & Mastering by Pascal Michael Stiefel
Visuals from Kirby's Return to Dream Land, recorded through https://noclip.website/

entry.title: How The Wind Waker Defined Cel Shading

media:group.media:title: How The Wind Waker Defined Cel Shading
media:group.media:description:
Let's figure out how The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker was able to pull off cel shading at a time when nobody else was able to.
🐦 https://twitter.com/JasperRLZ 💰 https://patreon.com/JasperRLZ 🤼 https://discord.gg/bkJmKKv 🌎 https://noclip.website
🎵 Jasper - Epoch ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DDmzbYV0d9M ) 🎵 Allister Brimble - Fluidity - Tutorial ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WsGVUgZ7AUg ) 🎵 Masakazu Sugimori - Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Trial ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UEGVxLs6Sr0 ) 🎵 猫叉Master - Elebits - Story Mode ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sAXS7FbC9Dk )
🎥 E3 2002 Trailer for The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RxMos9muPYQ ) 🎥 The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time Title Screen Cutscenes HD ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UknzWR7jGDY ) 🎥 Nintendo 2000 SpaceWorld Zelda Demo ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i1MrzjeR2NY ) 🎥 E3 2001 Pikmin Footage ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0P_HOcZmqu0 ) 🎥 SpaceWorld 2001 Super Mario Sunshine Footage ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N9LE152PswU ) 🎥 Cel Damage ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dZu7sVzuXu0 ) 🎥 XIII ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WFOlIrJ58A0 ) 🎥 Unity 5 Graphics - Lighting Overview ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eGu9_8HS2uI ) 🎥 Katamari Damacy ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PVVW41iAu5A ) 🎥 PBR Diffuse Lighting for GGX+Smith Microsurfaces ( https://gdcvault.com/play/1024063/PBR-Diffuse-Lighting-for-GGX ) 🎥 Yoshiaki Koizumi @ Montreal International Game Summit 2007 ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A25Ab7RyUPs )
Extra VFX used: ✨ VHS Overlay by InCinema, CC-BYhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nQ_Z-fGzvkk )
Special thanks 💜 Will, Jewel, Jeremy, Mia, Argle Bargle Additional special thanks 💙 Andre, LagoLunatic, Mike, SageOfMirrors, LordNed, Xara, Creative Corner
00:00 Intro 02:32 How The Wind Waker Defined Cel Shading 17:29 Channel Update

entry.title: How scrolling textures gave Super Mario Galaxy 2 its charm

media:group.media:title: How scrolling textures gave Super Mario Galaxy 2 its charm
media:group.media:description:
Let's dive into Super Mario Galaxy 2, and explore how a small team at Nintendo pushed simple developer techniques to their limits to make something that still looks good today.
◆ Twitter: https://twitter.com/JasperRLZ ◆ noclip.website: https://noclip.website/ ◆ Visit Slimy Spring Galaxy in your web browser! https://noclip.website/#smg2/UnderGroundDangeonGalaxy
Extra footage used: ◆ Breaking Conventions with The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, from GDC 2017. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QyMsF31NdNc
Music: ◆ The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker - The Great Sea ◆ Super Mario Galaxy - Cosmos Illusion ◆ Super Mario Galaxy - Teardrop
Special thanks: Shesez, Jewel, Instant Grat, Andre, Will, Jonas, Dotsarecool, Creative Corner

media:group.media:title: Hyakugojyuuichi!!! (HD)
media:group.media:description:
Obviously, I claim absolutely no credit for this. Originally created by Neil Cicierega in 2001, and passed around on many angelfire and tripod sites.
I couldn't find pika.swf in anything but like 240p quality on-line. Rendered out in glorious 1080p for your ultimate viewing experience, and mixed with higher quality audio.
http://wiki.animutationportal.com/Hyakugojyuuichi

entry.title: Katamari on the Rocks (Beta) - Katamari Damacy

media:group.media:title: Katamari on the Rocks (Beta) - Katamari Damacy
media:group.media:description: Found on the game disc for the original Katamari Damacy for PS2. Haven't seen uploaded to YouTube before.
